Name: Mystery Solitaire. Powerful Alchemist 3
About the game: Solve the secret of potion-making! Solitaire game in the genre of medieval alchemy entourage. In the game you are waiting for 200 levels in 20 locations, for the passage of which you will receive unique potions. 200 levels is an opportunity to play your favorite genre every day! The unique balance of the game and the complexity of the levels will allow you to enjoy the game and strain your mind. - Levels that are fun to solve - Solitaire card game - collect a chain of cards! - Colorful graphics and theme music - the perfect solitaire game! - Draw cards faster, thanks to the joker - increase the multiplier combo, Which gives you more coins! - Collect 15 alchemical solutions! - Original themed decks and 12 card shirt styles!
